fieldGroup.template: Taking into account the interventions and tests that are going to be performed on the research subjects described in section 3.4.3, how would you assess the possible risks or discomforts according to the following definition?

options.label: Minimal risk: that which does not exceed in probability or magnitude that which would be expected in daily activities, including routine physical or psychological examinations.

Risk greater than minimal: that which occurs when the possibility of physical, psychological or damage related to the invasion of privacy or confidentiality is greater than that expected in everyday behaviour.
